name: Keep Tryin' 2
description:
Keep Tryin' 2 is the 'sequel' to Keep Tryin' (which is a gag game/software test.)

You play as Saem again...or is it... you're playing with Saem?

Find out.

Credits:

Characters: Tokudaya

Backgrounds: Ayaemo Creative Institute (various artists)

Music: Lehxra

Font: Dafont
